Uses of Package
org.jqurantree.orthography

Packages that use org.jqurantree.orthography
org.jqurantree.orthography Contains an orthography object model of the Holy Quran, with orthographic elements represented by the classes Document, Chapter, Verse and Token. 
org.jqurantree.tanzil Provides classes for reading the Unicode XML source of the orthography model, the Tanzil project's Uthmani distribution. 
 

Classes in org.jqurantree.orthography used by org.jqurantree.orthography
Chapter
          One of the 114 chapters in the Holy Quran, with a unique chapter name and number.
Location
          The location of an element in the orthography model, consisting of a chapter number, verse number and token number.
Token
          An orthographic token is whitespace-delimited ArabicText within a verse.
Verse
          The verse class represents one of the numbered verses in a chapter.
 

Classes in org.jqurantree.orthography used by org.jqurantree.tanzil
Chapter
          One of the 114 chapters in the Holy Quran, with a unique chapter name and number.
